Colombia: English corsair Francis Drake attacks Riohacha
Indinesia: de Houtman’s expedition reaches Banten the main pepper port of West Java where they clash with both the Portuguese and Indonesians. It then sails east along the north coast of Java losing twelve crew to a Javanese attack at Sidayu and killing a local ruler in Madura.
Philippine: Francisco de Tello de Guzmán appointed Governor-General (1596–1602)
Poland: Transfer of capital from Kraków to Warsaw
